means: 新生儿短暂的血氨过高

sentence.Network_en: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们所谓的回答不过是表示承认的咕哝罢了。

sentence.Network_en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。

sentence.Network_en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English than(ne), thon(ne), thænne, originally the same word as then

entry.tran: (用于形容词、副词的比较级之后，连接比较对象)比
entry.def: You use than after a comparative adjective or adverb in order to link two parts of a comparison.

example.ex: The radio only weighs a few ounces and is smaller than a cigarette packet...
example.tran: 这台收音机重量仅为几盎司，比香烟盒还小。

example.ex: Indian skins age far more slowly than American or Italian ones.
example.tran: 印度人的皮肤比美国人或意大利人的皮肤衰老得慢得多。

entry.tran: (数目、数量、价值等)比…(多、少、重要或次要等)
entry.def: You use than when you are stating a number, quantity, or value approximately by saying that it is above or below another number, quantity, or value.

example.ex: They talked on the phone for more than an hour.
example.tran: 他们在电话里谈了一个多小时。

example.ex: ...the three-match Test series in England, starting in less than two months time...
example.tran: 再过不到两个月就要在英格兰开始的三场制国际板球对抗赛

entry.tran: 与其说，而不是(连接对比的对象，以表示优先考虑等)
entry.def: You use than in order to link two parts of a contrast, for example in order to state a preference.

example.ex: The arrangement was more a formality than a genuine partnership of two nations...
example.tran: 这一协定与其说体现了两个国家之间真正的伙伴关系，还不如说是一种形式。

example.ex: I would rather stare at a clear, star-filled sky than a TV set...
example.tran: 我宁可凝视繁星满天的晴朗夜空也不愿盯着电视机。

example.en: This is certainly more than I bargained for.
example.zh: 这肯定是比我所指望能获得的还要多。

sentences.en: The roads here are much quieter here than in London.
sentences.cn: 这里的道路比伦敦的安静多了。

sentences.en: I'd rather play football than go swimming.
sentences.cn: 与其去游泳我还不如去踢足球。

sentences.en: He is the person than whom I can imagine no one more courteous.
sentences.cn: 我想不出一个比他更有礼貌的人。

jushi.english: Nothing is more pleasant than finding insects in your bath.
jushi.chinese: 最使人不快的是在浴缸里发现有虫子。
